archetypes.name: Cool Front
archetypes.headline: A cool mint front is rolling through.
archetypes.blurb: You stay composed under pressure and keep everyone steady when the room gets loud.

archetypes.name: Bold Storm
archetypes.headline: A high-energy chocolate storm is active.
archetypes.blurb: You run hot, move fast, and usually become the spark that gets everyone going.

archetypes.name: Steady Classic
archetypes.headline: Stable conditions with reliable sweetness.
archetypes.blurb: You are dependable, consistent, and everyone knows they can count on your judgment.

archetypes.name: Candy Burst
archetypes.headline: High-pressure fun system with candy cores.
archetypes.blurb: You are playful and magnetic, and your plans usually turn into stories people repeat later.

archetypes.name: Berry Sunrise
archetypes.headline: A bright fruit band is moving in.
archetypes.blurb: You bring warmth and optimism; your energy makes people feel included and seen.

archetypes.name: Caramel Architect
archetypes.headline: Structured caramel layers with strategic depth.
archetypes.blurb: You like systems, planning, and thoughtful execution. You move with intent, not noise.

archetypes.name: Cheesecake Signal
archetypes.headline: Smooth, rich system with layered finish.
archetypes.blurb: You have range: polished at first read, then increasingly complex once people know you.

archetypes.name: Explorer Jetstream
archetypes.headline: Variable but exciting pattern with smart pivots.
archetypes.blurb: You chase new ideas, test quickly, and thrive when you can discover the unexpected.
